name: Tailor
description: A skilled craftsman who creates and alters clothing; adventurers can commission custom garments, get outfits fitted, or purchase ready-made clothing for various occasions.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the soft scent of fine fabrics and the sound of scissors cutting cloth and the gentle rustle of materials being measured and fitted. The air carries the promise of style and the essential nature of clothing craftsmanship, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of creative tailoring and the importance of proper presentation and fashion for all occasions.
